name: Teddie Levenfiche
background_summary: Teddie Levenfiche is a co-founder of PerfectTed, the UK's fastest-growing energy drink brand and Europe's leading matcha brand. He is a member of Forbes 30 Under 30 and has been recognized as the Great British Young Entrepreneur of the Year. Teddie has a diverse background spanning consulting, athletics, and law. He was born and raised in London, England, and attended the University of Pennsylvania, where he was a student-athlete. Prior to co-founding PerfectTed, Teddie worked as an associate consultant at Bain & Company.
